about_the_game:
Synopsis


A peaceful world where everyone survived. After considering how to use the time machine, the group decides to create a great invention that goes beyond an egg protector.
However, the main character, who has already spent all his money on making a time machine, will work part-time for Shin Ha-yeon...
It's not over until it's over! Leaf in Bootstrap, After Story! It starts now!

※ Click the DLC button on the lobby screen of this episode of Leaf in Bootstrap to quickly access the folder of the DLC. ※

Game play

In 15 days of repetition, different routes proceed depending on the user's choice.
The games will be played sequentially from Day 1 to Day 15, and days of the week may be omitted for some routes.
At the end of day 15, the ending is output, and it returns to day 1.
Some routes affect the release of other routes. Even if you exit the game, the release of the release will remain.

Producer Information


Production: Eugene Games
Illustration: Halla Tangerine
Shin Ha-yeon: Lee Eun-jo, LEEE EUNJO
Park Soo-ah as Heoella HEO ELLA
Directing: Choi Jinwoo CHOI JIN WOO [PLUSDICTION DIRECTOR]
Recorded: Olzestudio, studio OLZE STUDIO

Game composition


Leaf in Bootstrap: After Story Part
perk factor
Collecting characters
Collecting CGs
Gathering background music
A compilation of Shin Ha-yeon's Full Voice
Park Sua, a collection of full voices

Manipulation


Selection: Left-click on the mouse
Line progress: left click mouse, scroll down mouse, enter key
Line Rollback: Scroll up the mouse wheel
Image skip: Keyboard ESC key
Skip the perk element: mouse wheel up and down over the button

Resolution

The game is fixed at a resolution of 16:9 for optimal play.
Please refer to the benefits of adjusting the resolution.


※The game contains some sensational elements. (There is a CG wearing a bikini on the beach) ※
※The game contains some violent elements. (There are bloody representations of death.) ※
detailed_description:
Synopsis


A peaceful world where everyone survived. After considering how to use the time machine, the group decides to create a great invention that goes beyond an egg protector.
However, the main character, who has already spent all his money on making a time machine, will work part-time for Shin Ha-yeon...
It's not over until it's over! Leaf in Bootstrap, After Story! It starts now!

※ Click the DLC button on the lobby screen of this episode of Leaf in Bootstrap to quickly access the folder of the DLC. ※

Game play

In 15 days of repetition, different routes proceed depending on the user's choice.
The games will be played sequentially from Day 1 to Day 15, and days of the week may be omitted for some routes.
At the end of day 15, the ending is output, and it returns to day 1.
Some routes affect the release of other routes. Even if you exit the game, the release of the release will remain.

Producer Information


Production: Eugene Games
Illustration: Halla Tangerine
Shin Ha-yeon: Lee Eun-jo, LEEE EUNJO
Park Soo-ah as Heoella HEO ELLA
